name: Case #9
description:
Case # 9 - horror adventure in the style of sci-fi. The protagonist is a prisoner who is kept in the prison "Argon" and forced to work for them the whole term of his imprisonment, namely, to extract minerals. But one night, something went wrong and the hero had a chance to leave his cell. Solve the secrets of the prison and gain freedom.

Features:
- Solitary dungeon atmosphere that will challenge you
- Puzzles and objectives to solve and get through
- Sci-fi environment to explore
- Continuation of Case #8
